options.systemMessage:
=Extract the following from the user message:

* Origin City
* Destination City
* Departure Date
* Return Date (if present)


Return this in JSON format:
{
"origin": "",
"destination": "",
"departure_date": "",
"return_date": "",
"travelers": ""
}

User message: {{ $json.message.text }}

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

messageValues.message:
=Search  origin and destination airport codes a Set the following.
Turn the origin and destination into their airport codes.

Make sure the departures and return dates are in the future, not the past.

Here is the current date/time: {{ $now }}

parameters.query:
={
  "query": " top things to do in {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.destination }}",
  "topic":  "general", 
  "search_depth": "basic",
  "max_result": 3,
  "time_range": null, 
  "days": 3,
  "include_answer": true, 
  "include_raw_content": false,
  "include_images": false,
  "include_images_description": false,
  "include_domains": [],
  "exclude_domains": []
}

parameters.text: =# Flights from {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.origin }} to {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.destination }}  on {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.departure_date }}  to {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.return_date }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are an expert travel email writer at a leading travel agency. Your job is to create beautiful, engaging, and informative HTML emails that help travelers get excited for their upcoming trip. **Always output your response as a single valid JSON object containing two keys: "subject" and "emailBody".** - "subject": A short subject line that mentions the arrival location and travel dates. - "emailBody": A complete, well-structured HTML email according to the instructions below. --- ## Email Structure & Content 1. Introduction - Welcome the traveler and build excitement for their upcoming trip. - Reference the destination and travel dates. - Add a `
` (horizontal line) after this section. 2. Flights - Use an `

` header for this section. - List both departure and return dates/locations. - List each flight option with airline, time, duration and price. - Separate each flight with a line break. - End this section with a `
`. 3. Resorts - Use an `

` header for this section. - List each resort with a numered list (`
    `). - Each resort's name should be a clickable link (use the resort's website or booking URL). - Under each resort name, display an image using the following HTML format: ``) and end with a horizontal line (`
    `), except for the signoff. - Clickable links must be use ` ...`style="max-width:20%; height:auto;>`. - The email must be less than 1000 words. - Output must be in JSON as show below. ## Output Example { "subject": "Your Islamabad Getaway | June 17 - July 17, 2026", "emailBody": "

    Get ready for an incredible adventur! Your summer escape to Islamabad is almost here. We've put together the perfect plan to make this your most memorable trip yet<\p>..." }

assignments.name: response
assignments.value: =An email has been sent with the travel plan for: Your {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.destination }} Journey | {{ $('Edit Fields').item.json.departure_date }}.

message.text: Puedes darme información de vuelos de Caracas a Madrid del 17 de Enero 2026 al 17 de febrero de 2026 para una persona?

local_results.title: Hotel NH Collection Madrid Palacio de Tepa
local_results.address: C. de San Sebastián, 2, Centro, 28012 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Elegant lodging with dining & a spa. Modern quarters in a polished hotel offering a restaurant & a bar, plus a spa & a 24-hour gym.

local_results.title: Hotel NH Madrid Nacional
local_results.address: P.º del Prado, 48, Centro, 28014 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Laid-back lodging with a bar & dining. Classic 1920s-era hotel with modern rooms & free Wi-Fi, plus a Mediterranean restaurant & a bar.

local_results.title: DoubleTree by Hilton Madrid - Prado
local_results.address: C. de San Agustín, 3, Centro, 28014 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Upmarket hotel with Japanese dining. Sophisticated lodging offering a Japanese & Mediterranean fusion restaurant, plus a bar & a gym.

local_results.title: The Hat Madrid
local_results.address: C. Imperial, 9, Centro, 28012 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Trendy hostel with free breakfast. Bright rooms & dorms in a laid-back lodging with a rooftop bar, plus free Wi-Fi & breakfast.

local_results.title: Hyatt Centric Gran Via Madrid
local_results.address: Gran Vía, 31, Centro, 28013 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Chic hotel with dining & a rooftop bar. Polished quarters in a sophisticated hotel with a modern restaurant, a rooftop bar & a 24/7 gym.

local_results.title: NYX Madrid
local_results.address: C. del Aviador Zorita, 34, Tetuán, 28020 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Genteel property with dining & a bar. Simple rooms in a sophisticated property, with a restaurant and bar, plus breakfast buffet (fee).

local_results.title: Barceló Torre de Madrid
local_results.address: Plaza de España, 18, Moncloa - Aravaca, 28008 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Sleek hotel with Plaza views & a spa. Modern rooms & suites, some with Plaza de España views, in a hip hotel featuring dining & a spa.

local_results.title: Hotel Príncipe Pío
local_results.address: Cta. de San Vicente, 14, Moncloa - Aravaca, 28008 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Charming hotel with a formal restaurant. Quaint lodging offering warm rooms, plus a formal restaurant, a bar & an elegant lounge.

local_results.title: AC Hotel Carlton Madrid
local_results.address: Paseo de las Delicias, 26, Arganzuela, 28045 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Relaxed property with a bar & a gym. Unfussy rooms & suites in a casual lodging with a fitness room, a stylish bar & meeting space.

local_results.title: Hotel Sardinero Madrid
local_results.address: Plaza de Alonso Martínez, 3, Chamberí, 28004 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Upscale hotel with a chic lounge. Understated rooms & suites in a refined hotel offering a stylish cocktail lounge & 2 terraces.

local_results.title: Only YOU Hotel Atocha
local_results.address: P.º de la Infanta Isabel, 13, Retiro, 28014 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Upmarket hotel with dining & a gym. Warm quarters in an upscale hotel featuring 2 hip restaurant/bars, a bakery & a gym.

local_results.title: Intelier Palacio San Martín
local_results.address: Pl. de San Martín, 5, Centro, 28013 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Elegant lodging with a restaurant. Warmly decorated quarters in a refined property offering a gym & a restaurant with a terrace.

local_results.title: Axel Hotel Madrid
local_results.address: C. de Atocha, 49, Centro, 28012 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Vibrant, retro lodging with a pool. Lively hotel offering swanky rooms & suites with ’80s flair, plus dining, bars & a rooftop pool.

local_results.title: Petit Palace Lealtad Plaza
local_results.address: C. de Antonio Maura, 5, Retiro, 28014 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Upmarket hotel offering casual dining. Modern rooms, some with balconies, in an upscale hotel featuring a relaxed restaurant/bar.

local_results.title: Hotel Villa Real
local_results.address: Pl. de las Cortes, 10, Centro, 28014 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Elegant hotel featuring modern dining. Refined hotel offering stylish rooms & suites, a modern Mediterranean restaurant/bar & a gym.

local_results.title: JW Marriott Hotel Madrid
local_results.address: C. de Sevilla, 2, Centro, 28014 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Polished hotel with dining & a spa. Elegant hotel offering a fitness center & a spa, plus a restaurant, a bar & a breakfast buffet.

local_results.title: Hotel Urban
local_results.address: Cra de S. Jerónimo, 34, Centro, 28014 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Luxe art deco property with posh dining. Plush rooms in a refined art deco hotel with an acclaimed restaurant & an oyster/cocktail bar.

local_results.title: The Madrid EDITION
local_results.address: Pl. de Celenque, 2, Centro, 28013 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Posh hotel with restaurants & a pool. Contemporary rooms & suites in a chic hotel featuring 2 restaurants, an outdoor pool & a spa.

local_results.title: Inhala Hotel Garden
local_results.address: C. de San Bernardo, 1, Centro, 28013 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Upscale property with a rooftop pool. Stylish rooms in a high-end hotel featuring dining, a rooftop pool & meeting space.

local_results.title: Leonardo Hotel Madrid City Center
local_results.address: C. de Alberto Aguilera, 18, Chamberí, 28015 Madrid, Spain
local_results.description: Relaxed lodging with a terrace. Warm rooms & suites in a laid-back property featuring a terrace & complimentary Wi-Fi.

results.content: Start with my 17 best things to do in Madrid · Visit the main attractions · Watch a live flamenco show · Experience a bullfight · Go to a football match · Chill out

results.content: Book a cultural tour for access to museums, the Royal Palace of Madrid, and day trips to Toledo. Fuel up on food (tapas, anyone?) before checking out the

results.title: Madrid Events Calendar: 2025
results.content: Madrid Top 10. Discover the city's most popular sights and attractions, from one of Europe's largest royal palaces to the magnificent Prado Museum and the Real

results.title: 2025 in Madrid : r/MadridTravelGuide - Reddit
results.content: Madrid has always been a safe city and you can usually walk around alone in the centre late at night with two important exceptions.

results.title: The Best Things to Do in Madrid, According to a Local
results.content: Here, we have gathered together Madrid's most iconic places, the ones that are must-sees and where you should head first, especially if your time is limited.
